One more thing I forgot to mention:

Using Warp Space in a large area will slow down the game after a 
while.  I wouldn't some option to limit the range of the warp space 
attack because it could slow the game down fairly easily if you 
hitting opponents.  Ideally, warp space attack is based used when 
surrounded by more than 20 opponents.
